Privacy Policy

1. Introduction

These Privacy Policy (‚ÄúPrivacy Policy‚Äù) apply to the use of the website and products provided by (hereinafter also referred as ‚Äúwe‚Äù or ‚Äúus‚Äù). Our registered office is at Gurgaon, Haryana, registered no.: 8607901606.

This Privacy Policy applies and has effect in respect of all services and other products, software, made available by us, as well as any other online features relating to the website and its content (the ‚ÄúService(s)‚Äù).

If you have any questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at{' '} rohanmishra.design@gmail.com .

We are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. The Privacy Policy explains the basis on which personal information we collect from you will be processed by us or on our behalf. Where we decide the purpose or means for which personal data you supply through these Services is processed, we are the ‚Äúcontroller‚Äù. Where you decide the purpose or means for which personal data you supply through these Services is processed, you are the ‚Äúcontroller‚Äù. We will comply with proper and applicable data protection laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679.

We encourage you to read this Privacy Policy carefully as it contains important information about the following:

1. What information we may collect about you;
2. How we will use the information we collect about you;
3. Whether we will disclose your details to anyone else; and
4. Your choices and rights regarding the personal information you have provided to us.
